scripts.watch-prose: yarn watch --interval 0.1 'yarn -s sass --no-charset src/index.scss dist/index.css' src
scripts.build-prose: yarn -s sass --no-charset src/index.scss dist/index.css && yarn -s sass --no-charset -s compressed src/index.scss dist/index.min.css
scripts.build-reset: yarn -s sass --no-charset src/tailwind-base.scss dist/reset.css && yarn -s sass --no-charset -s compressed src/tailwind-base.scss dist/reset.min.css
